overview: Al is a balikbayan who returns to his former hometown where his mother is buried. There he meets his childhood friend Cristy who works as a counselor for family planning. Eventually they develop a romantic relationship and end up as a couple. However, a mysterious lady appears one day while Al tends to his motherâ€™s grave. Al falls in love with the stranger and is now torn between her and Cristy.
title: Haplos
